response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which holds significant value to us at $15,000. Given its worth to you is estimated at $8,000, I believe we can find a mutually beneficial arrangement. Considering the unique benefits and features this product offers, I am extending an offer to purchase it from me at $12,000. This price not only reflects the value you perceive but also allows for a reasonable profit margin for us. I look forward to your positive response. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 12000}
